item.title: CVE-2022-32587|2024-09-16T17:28:44.166Z -- codeandmore -- wp%20page%20widget%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in CodeAndMore WP Page Widget plugin <= 3.9 on WordPress leading to plugin settings change.
